favourite.article: A very good hymn that encourage us to go to God to be thought.

I believe one desire of the Son of Man, Who came to seek & save those who are lost is to "teach us the value of a soul". Oh bless the Lord, oh my soul..worship His Holy name. Teach these rich, truth filled songs to our younger generation, may they kindle the flame within our hearts to worship & follow the Lamb, wherever He leadeth.
Thank you so much for publishing these lyrics. The words will be my prayer. 2 Peter 3:18 - Grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.
